Package controller

Class mainForm

java.lang.Object
controller.mainForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the main form. It provides the tables and buttons for interacting with data.
Author:
Chase Alan Jarvis
